beforeMeeting.text: I have to do this right. On we go.

afterGoodQTE.text: I intend to build an "Ultra Space Flying Car" to go and house every human on Jupiter!

afterGoodQTE.text: It will be great for you - I mean for us!
The spaceship will be ready next Friday! Aren't you excited? You're welcome. Now let's go eat.

afterMeeting.text: Tonight I am being interviewed by John McScience. Better be prepared.
